verses.verse: Lord, <S%H136><s%> you have been our dwelling place <S%H4583><s%> for all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>

Before the mountains <S%H2022><s%> were brought forth, <S%H3205><s%> before you had formed <S%H2342><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> and the world, <S%H8398><s%> even from everlasting <S%H5769><s%> to <S%H5704><s%> everlasting, <S%H5769><s%> you are God. <S%H410><s%>
You turn <S%H7725><s%> man <S%H582><s%> to destruction, <S%H1793><s%> saying, <S%H7725><s%> "Return, you children <S%H1121><s%> of men. <S%H120><s%>"

For a thousand <S%H505><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in your sight <S%H5869><s%> are just like <S%H3117><s%> yesterday <S%H865><s%> when it is past, <S%H5674><s%> like a watch <S%H821><s%> in the night. <S%H3915><s%>
You sweep <S%H2229><s%> them away as they sleep. <S%H8142><s%> In the morning <S%H1242><s%> they sprout <S%H2498><s%> like new grass. <S%H2682><s%>
In the morning <S%H1242><s%> it sprouts <S%H6692><s%> and springs up. <S%H2498><s%> By evening, <S%H6153><s%> it is withered <S%H3001><s%> and dry. <S%H4135><s%>
For we are consumed <S%H3615><s%> in your anger. <S%H639><s%> We are troubled <S%H926><s%> in your wrath. <S%H2534><s%>
You have set <S%H7896><s%> our iniquities <S%H5771><s%> before you, <S%H5956><s%> our secret sins in the light <S%H3974><s%> of your presence. <S%H6440><s%>
For all our days <S%H3117><s%> have passed away <S%H6437><s%> in your wrath. <S%H5678><s%> We bring <S%H3615><s%> our years <S%H8141><s%> to an end as a sigh. <S%H1899><s%>

The days <S%H3117><s%> of our years <S%H8141><s%> are seventy, <S%H7657><s%> <S%H7657><s%> <S%H8141><s%> or even by reason of strength <S%H1369><s%> eighty <S%H8084><s%> years; <S%H8141><s%> yet their pride <S%H7296><s%> is but labor <S%H5999><s%> and sorrow, <S%H205><s%> for it passes <S%H1468><s%> quickly, <S%H2440><s%> and we fly away. <S%H5774><s%>
Who knows <S%H3045><s%> the power <S%H5797><s%> of your anger, <S%H639><s%> your wrath <S%H5678><s%> according to the fear that is due to you? <S%H3374><s%>
So teach <S%H3045><s%> us to number <S%H4487><s%> our days, <S%H3117><s%> that we may gain <S%H935><s%> a heart <S%H3824><s%> of wisdom. <S%H2451><s%>
Relent, <S%H7725><s%> Yahweh! <S%H3068><s%> How long? <S%H5162><s%> Have compassion on your servants! <S%H5650><s%>
Satisfy <S%H7646><s%> us in the morning <S%H1242><s%> with your loving kindness, <S%H2617><s%> that we may rejoice <S%H7442><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> all our days. <S%H3117><s%>
Make us glad <S%H8055><s%> for as many days <S%H3117><s%> as you have afflicted <S%H6031><s%> us, <S%H8141><s%> for as many years as we have seen <S%H7200><s%> evil. <S%H7451><s%>
Let your work <S%H6467><s%> appear <S%H7200><s%> to your servants; <S%H5650><s%> your glory <S%H1926><s%> to their children. <S%H1121><s%>

Let the favor <S%H5278><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> be on us; <S%H3559><s%> establish the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands <S%H3027><s%> for us; <S%H3559><s%> yes, establish the work <S%H4639><s%> of our hands. <S%H3027><s%>
